TEXT.TITLE: BELL CANADA <BCE> EXTENDS STOCK BUYBACK
TEXT.BODY: Bell Canada Enterprises Inc said it extended to June 30 from June 4 a short-term voluntary sale program for shareholders owning 10 or fewer Bell Canada common shares. The plan allows such shareholders of record at April 21 to sell their shares at market price without incurring brokerage commissions or other charges. Bell Canada was quoted at 42 dlrs, up 1/4, in afternoon trading on the Toronto Stock Exchange. Reuter
